post:
Prohostingserver was found in 2013, and is based out of India. We currently provide shared, reseller, OpenVZ, and KVM VPS hosting. We are dedicated to providing good service and premium quality at an affordable price.


Features :-

Fully Scalable : You can change your VPS plan any time without any data loss or downtime. Many customer first buy small vps and gradually upgrade as per their needs.

SolusVM Control Panel : SolusVM control panel allows customer to start ,stop and reboot there VPS any time , reinstall OS , reset there root passwords and also provide basic monitoring such as RAM usage etc.

RAID 10 HDD: All our Nodes are powered by RAID 10 HDD to provide superior read/write performance and result is in a balanced increase in both redundancy and performance.

7 Days refund policy : If you are not satisfied with our servers then you can get 100% refund within seven days.

OS:-Windows 2008 R2 or Windows 2012 R2 or Any Linux
